text: I LOVE THE QUICK SIMPLE GREAT TASTE OF STARBUCKS IN AN INSTANT. BUT THEY CAME UP WITH THE LOUSY ELONGATED AND SKINNY PACKETS. THEY ARE HARD TO HOLD, DIFFICULT TO EASILY OPEN AND WHEN YOU HAVE HOT WATER IN A CUP--THE STEAM CLOGS THE NARROW OPENING OF THE PACKET MAKING IT DIFFICULT TO POUR IN YOUR CUP.. WHY CANT STARBUCKS PUT IT INTO A WIDE PACKET LIKE EQUAL OR SWEET AND LOW? GREAT PRODUCT--DUMB PACKAGING.
